titleStmt.title: Remaines of that reverend and learned divine, Iohn Preston, Dr. in Divinity, chaplaine in ordinary to his Majesty, master of Emanuel Colledge in Cambridge, and sometimes preacher of Lincolnes-Inne Containing three excellent treatises, namely, Iudas's repentance. The saints spirituall strength. Pauls conversion.
titleStmt.author: Preston, John, 1587-1628.

titleStmt.title: Remaines of that reverend and learned divine, Iohn Preston, Dr. in Divinity, chaplaine in ordinary to his Majesty, master of Emanuel Colledge in Cambridge, and sometimes preacher of Lincolnes-Inne Containing three excellent treatises, namely, Iudas's repentance. The saints spirituall strength. Pauls conversion.
titleStmt.author: Preston, John, 1587-1628.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by John Beale] for Andrew Crooke,

notesStmt.note: The words "Iudas's repentance. .. conversion." are bracketed together on the title page.
"Iudas his repentance", "The saints spirituall strength", and "Pauls conversion" each have separate dated title page: pagination and register are continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.
